name: King Of Steaks - ASMR Cooking
description:
Cook tasty meat and find out what it takes to be the king of steaks!
Cater different clients in your restaurant and get your meat cooking fever on! Pick your slice, season it, sizzle it and don’t forget to add the most satisfying side dishes to complete your meal.
This game is the best food game you will encounter! Better than fruit ninja, the cook and line chef…
Show your skills with the knife and prove yourself as the ultimate master chef!


To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app
